songs.title: Sexual Harassment (’G’ Thang Jam)
songs.lyrics:
[Intro: Unknown]
Answering Machine Beep
This is a motherfucking test
Ladies, play this song before you have sex
And if your man finishes before this song does, trade his ass in

[Verse 1: Unknown]
I wanna feel you inside
Come on and take a ride
This ass is all for you
(Come and fuck me like a ho, ho-oh)

[Hook: Various, unknown]
Sexual harassment (Sexual harassment)
Sexual harassment (Sexual harassment)

[Verse 2: Unknown]
I wanna feel you on top
(Get it up, get it up, get it up, get it up)
What can a limp dick do
(Nights have (empty?) have control, ho-oh)
Baby

[Hook]

[Verse 3: Dr. Dre (Unknown)]
Hold your head back (Uh, oh)
Lay it to the side (Huh, oh)
Hey bitch, (Dre) open those thighs (Oh baby)
Hold your head back, back, back (Oh), now close your eyes (Oh)
Hey bitch (Damn), open those thighs (Uh, uh, oh)

[Hook] x1.5

[Verse 4: Unknown]
So when I feel you, inside me
Say sexual harassment
Say you wanna fuck (Sexual harassment, sexual harassment), let's get in on (Sexual)
It's sexual harassment (Sexual harassment)
Oh baby, (Sexual harassment, sexual harassment) give it to me (Sexual), get on (Sexual harassment), get it on
Say give it to me (Sexual harassment, sexual harassment), oh give it to me (Sexual)
Not 17 (Sexual harassment), has got it under control
Oh, oh

[Guitar Interlude]

[Outro: Dr. Dre]
Heavy Breathing
Goddamn this song longer than a motherfucka
I'm dying in this motherfucka
